debug.description: Print debug information to the console.
debug.label: Debug mode

listenToNotifications.description: React to GPU mode change notifications from rog-control-center.
listenToNotifications.label: Listen for mode change notifications

patchPending.description: Guess the required action instead of relying on the output of supergfxctl.
patchPending.label: Guess fallback action

polling.description: Periodically poll the supergfxctl process for status updates. Warning: this can cause supergfxctl to hang!
polling.label: Polling
